src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/memalloc.f File Reference

Detailed Description

If FLAG is 1 then memory is allocated for the following common arrays:

  • phi (order parameter)
  • ni (near neighbors)
  • f (order parameter distribution function)
  • g (momentum distribution function)

and the MPI buffer arrays required by the parallel D3Q7/D3Q19 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM. Memory is deallocated when FLAG is different from one.

Definition in file memalloc.f.

Go to the source code of this file.
